'''Quartz bricks''' is the brick variant of the [[block of quartz]], obtained through crafting.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Quartz bricks can be [[breaking|mined]] using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, it [[drops]] nothing.

== Usage ==
=== Note blocks ===
Quartz bricks can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
